meanings.sent1: The upraised hand signaled for attention.

meanings.definition: Elevated or raised to a higher position
meanings.sent1: The upraised bridge spanned the river.
meanings.sent2: The upraised voices echoed through the hall.
meanings.sent3: The upraised toast celebrated the occasion.
meanings.sent4: The upraised stakes determined the winner.
meanings.sent5: The upraised platform provided a better view of the game.
